snippet: "The Book of Mormon" topped the Broadway box office last week, thanks to premium ticket pricing and the fact that it remains in a relatively small theater.
abstract: "The Book of Mormon" topped the Broadway box office last week, thanks to premium ticket pricing and the fact that it remains in a relatively small theater.

headline.main: 'Book of Mormon' Tops Broadway Box Office For First Time
headline.print_headline: Big Week for Mormons: First Romney, Now ‘Book’
